## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [SALK_026637C]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Seedlings more susceptible (lower fresh weight) fo stress (H2O2, MMs, Cisplatin) as compared to WT.
   - [maf1-2]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Seedlings more susceptible (lower fresh weight) fo stress (H2O2, MMs, Cisplatin) as compared to WT. More susceptible to Torin-1 (lower total chlorophyll content) and AZD8055 (reduced root growth) as compared to WT.
